titleStmt.title: Delicious entertainments of the soule written by the holy and most reuerend Lord Francis de Sales, Bishop and Prince of Geneua. Translated by a Dame of our Ladies of comfort of the order of S. Bennet in Cambray
titleStmt.author: Francis, de Sales, Saint, 1567-1622.
Deacon, Pudentiana, 1581?-1645.
More, Agnes, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Gheerart Pinson, vnder the signe of the Cuclen,

notesStmt.note: Translated by P. Deacon; the translation was formerly attributed to A. More.--STC.
Running title reads: The B. of Geneua his spirituall entertainments.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: Gheerart Pinson, vnder the signe of the Cuclen
